body.instructions: You are an expert on sentiment analysis. Your job is to evaluate the sentiment of the given text message.
body.input:
Given the following text message: 'The service here is very good!', please evaluate its sentiment by giving a score in the range of -1 to 1, where -1 means negative and 1 means positive.
    Also explain why.

score.title: Score
score.description: Sentiment score in the range of -1 to 1, where -1 means negative and 1 means positive.
